'cause then you're attacking a political belief, no violation of hate speech rules even if the belief is that we shouldn't hate people (5/5)
but it's fine to attack this construct of the "social justice warrior" i.e people who advocate for the rights of marginalised groups, (4/5)
Most social media platforms won't let you attack a particular ethnic group, gender, sexuality etc, (3/5)
it's become a way to slide what would otherwise be hate speech into online spaces where hate speech would be a violation of TOS (2/5)
